module.name: Capture Groups
module.changelog: *0.1* Test New Module *0.2* Se sale del grupo de captura apropiadamente, antes no se desuscribia. Busqueda de extensiones. Grupos y extensiones virtuales son ahora automaticos
module.description: This module allow the administrator to quickly create and administrate capture groups. It will configure every extension's capturegroup and pickupgroup automatically.
